scripts.build: browserify -t aliasify -t brfs -t [ envify ] -e main.js | uglifyjs -mc --screw-ie8 -o ../build.js
scripts.build-final: browserify -t aliasify -t brfs -t [ envify ]-e main.js | uglifyjs -mc --screw-ie8 -o ../build.js
scripts.glslmin: mkdir -p shaders-min; for i in shaders/*.glsl; do cat $i | glsl-transition-minify > shaders-min/`basename $i`; done
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd .. && git add --all . && git commit -am . && git push -u origin gh-pages
scripts.warnings: for i in `find . -name '*.js' -and -not -ipath '*/node_modules/*'`; do echo ${i}': '; cat $i | uglifyjs -mc -o /dev/null; done
